gauss_book.full:
Scientific developments related to the Gaussian magnetoresistive effect
The significance of these works can only be understood by having access to military data servers, for example, in air defense bunkers.

craft_anarchist_cookbook.full: All secret recipes in one book!

zippo.full: For a fire you need: wood, paper, diesel fuel and ax

craft_tt.full: TT higher rate of fire and reload

craft_pps43_m.full: Blued steel is very suitable for this PP

craft_m24_m.full: This is the most vandalizing advice you've ever seen.

craft_sks_s.short: Mounting the sight on the SKS

nocraft_cateye.full: Military development makes a person almost invisible

pps43_m.full: A lighter version of PPS-43, more speed - less odds! (Ideal for a partner)

m24_m.full: Break the scope - surprise the enemy, shoot faster without aiming

gauss.full: Yes, yes - that same Gauss rifle

crocodildo.full: No one wants to mess with a deadly drunk clown with a crocodildo, and I know one security guard who will really like this dilda

opg_igor_head.full: Igor's head from the organized crime group Death

opg_dima_head.full: Head of Dima from the organized crime group Death

opg_lena_head.full: Lena's head from the organized crime group Death

gauss_pt1.full: It is immediately clear that these are parts of some kind of military development.

gauss_pt2.full: It is immediately clear that these are parts of some kind of military development.

gauss_pt3.full: It is immediately clear that these are parts of some kind of military development.

gidrator.full: Saves from dehydration in the wasteland, despite being hidden under clothes

armor81_inviz.full: Bullet-proof vest 6B2 - not displayed on the model

cateye.full: You sneak like a cat in the night for sausage, and the pockets of others are completely open for you

bearsteel.full: With the help of this potion, a crowbar and some f... mother, you can break any lock.

bearsback.full: You will be able to carry an extra ton with you

belamor.full: A drop of nikatin kills a horse, and blows a man to shreds!

bormotuha.full: Go blind? This is not the worst thing that can happen from it.

waterfall_ampoule.full: Concentrated water from the Bed Gorge waterfall - it is better not to use this without supervision

kvas.full: Nuka Kvas it's the rarest drink in the wastelands.

alenka_comp: Hey! Don't tread on my feet.
Okay, okay. It's not hard for me to move.

quests.q_gauss: [Wasteland] Find and collect 3 parts from the Gauss project (Perhaps you should look in military bunkers and at the bases of large organized crime groups)
quests.tunnelofdeath_check: [Peregon] Find out why stalkers disappear in the Tunel of Death
quests.no_ment: [Krasnoznamenny] To rid the city of corrupt cops and at the same time from bandit power (to clear the bunker of the Chamber of Commerce - optional)
quests.oblivion_quest: [Waterfall] Bring the Distillate from the Mysterious Waterfall to the Herbalist
quests.finde_bormotuha: [Otradnoye] Bring 2 bottles of vodka, vodka, brandy and 1 moonshine with fly agaric to the moonshiner to the outskirts of the village
quests.lost_caravan_ya1: [Otradnoye] Merchant Yashin asks to take away the weapons plundered from his caravan from the raiders
quests.castle_help: [Castle] Help Gazi-Mohammad check what kind of monsters are attacking the caravans
